item.title: day 1
item.description: Challenge Write about rev’s 2024 vision Tasks Record Morning Walk & Talk Edit and upload Morning Walk & Talk Read two chapters of The 5 AM Club Clean my room Catch up with Eren ...

item.title: day 2
item.description: My daily goals from yesterday were too ambitious and I didn’t complete all of them. I will start my day with a 5k morning run today and set more realistic goals and focus on completing one task for each category.

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: My name is Allen Lin and I’m a 4th-year CS student at Northeastern University. I was born in Taiwan and I moved to the United States when I was 13. I’m deeply passionate about AGI, tech entrepreneurship, and education.

item.title: rev
item.description: rev started as a community of builders and founders back in March 2024. The goal was simply to create a community where technical founders can come together to learn, build, and bounce ideas with each other.

item.title: Fireplace
item.description: Today is May 2nd, 2024, and we have eight months left in the year. I think it’s more realistic to split our goals into two parts, each spanning 4 months, or a quarter.

item.title: Discipline
item.description: Do the hard work, especially when you don’t feel like it Here’s my daily routine: Morning 7:00 AM: Wake up, get out of bed, drink a glass of water, and walk straight into cold shower ...

item.title: Goals
item.description: Starting today, I want to document (build in public) my journey to making my first million dollars. I will set goals each day before I go to bed, follow through the next day when I wake up, and repeat the process until I reach $1M.
